context/1: I don't know.
context/2: Well, to tell you the truth, Mr. Newspaperman,
context/3: just why did you kill those inoffensive people?
context/4: As man to man, tell me, Sergeant Ottermole,
context/6: One little thing I'd like to clear up.
context/7: But there's one thing I don't understand.
context/8: The answer seems so simple now.
